Sign up for Gas South

1. Residential Rate Plan

These great everyday low rates are available through November 5th, 2013. And don't forget — with Gas South, you never pay a deposit to establish service! Rates and bill credit eligibility are subject to credit approval.

Your enrollment is eligible for $75 in bill credits.

5. Credit Check Details

* Required Fields

Your social security number will only be used to verify your credit score, and will not be used for any other purposes. You may also enroll by calling 1-877-332-5442 Mon-Fri: 7am-8pm, Sat: 8am-5pm EST.

By submitting this document you hereby authorize Gas South to perform a credit check and establish residential natural gas service with Gas South. Depending on credit approval, your customer service fee will either be $5.95 or $9.95 per month ($3.95 for qualified seniors).


Fixed rate plans are subject to a $150 early contract cancellation fee if you choose to terminate your fixed rate contract before it expires.
